questions.text: An electronics student is attempting to measure the current through a resistor, but the setup he built is not working correctly. What does he need to change?

answerChoices.text: Replace the ammeter with another ammeter that has a lower maximum value.
Replace the ammeter with another ammeter that has a higher maximum value.
First, reverse the probes on the back of the ammeter, then check for other issues.
The circuit, as built, will begin to overhead the battery. The student should disconnect it immediately and reconnect the ammeter differently.

questions.text: An electronics student wants to measure the resistance of a the resistor. He sets up a voltmeter and ammeter correctly. The results are shown below. Based on these measurements, which choice is the best estimate of the resistance of the resistor?
